name: Consume (Micron_Flash)
description:
Currently just a sudo random universe and solar system generator. You can explore the universe and discover hundreds of unique solar systems.

You can currently only build unlimited water extractors on some planets

Leave me a comment if you would like to see this turn into a full game

Instructions:

Hold Middle mouse button and drag to move camera

Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Hovering your mouse over a sun will show the number of planets in its solar system

Clicking on a sun will unlock and reveal the solar system. It will also lock your camera. Clicking on a sun again will free your camera but you will have limited movement. 

You can continue to click on new suns and discover new planets. You can slowly work your way across the universe jumping between solar systems

There are 3 types for planets each planted has a unique name and attributes. Clicking on a planet will focus on it and allow you to build on that planet.
